title: Man Who Dragged Officer Into Jan. 6 Mob Is Sentenced to 90 Months
description: The sentence for the defendant, Albuquerque Cosper Head, was one of the most severe penalties handed down so far in the Justice Departmentâ€™s investigation of the Capitol attack.
